details:
noun
- the act of extinguishing
= synonyms: extinguishing, quenching
- a conditioning process in which the reinforcer is removed and a conditioned response becomes independent of the conditioned stimulus
= synonyms: experimental extinction
- complete annihilation
= example: complete annihilation
= synonyms: extermination
- the reduction of the intensity of radiation as a consequence of absorption and radiation
- no longer in existence
= example: no longer in existence
= synonyms: extinct, nonextant, defunctness
- no longer active
